data.text:
Christopher Knight has been in 8 on-screen matchups, including Carol Huston in A Very Brady Christmas (1988), Denise Nickerson in The Brady Bunch (1969), Kathy O'Dare in The Brady Bunch (1969), Meadow Williams in Light Years Away (2008) and Dana Plato in The Love Boat (1977).

Christopher Knight is a member of the following lists: American television actors, American child actors and American businesspeople.

Christopher Anton Knight (born November 7, 1957) is an American actor and businessman. He is best known for playing Peter Brady on the 1970s series The Brady Bunch. He has since gone on to become a successful businessman and enjoyed a semi-resurgence in the public eye with television appearances in the 2000s. His father, Edward Knight, was also an actor.
